Translations.Text: Anikorera imitwaro yanyu iremereye akayijyana aho mutari gushobora kugera bitabagoye. Mu by’ukuri, Nyagasani wanyu ni Nyir’impuhwe zihebuje,Nyir’imbabazi
(Yanaremye) ifarasi, icyimanyi (cy’ifarasi n’indogobe) ndetse n’indogobe; kugira ngo mubigendereho, kandi binababere imitako. Yanaremyen’ibindi bintu mutazi
Allah ni we werekana inzira igororotse, ariko hari n’izindi zigoramye. Kandi iyo aza kubishaka yari kubayobora mwese
Ni we umanura amazi (imvura) aturutse mu kirere, mukayanywa ndetse akanameza ibimera muragiramo amatungo yanyu
Ayameresha ibihingwa, imizeti, imitende, imizabibu ndetse na buri bwoko bw’imbuto. Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo harimo inyigisho ku bantu batekereza

Kandi yaborohereje ijoro (kugira ngo mubashe kuruhuka) n’amanywa (kugira ngo mubashe gukora), izuba n’ukwezi (kugira ngo bibamurikire), ndetse n’inyenyeri zorohejwe ku bw’itegeko rye. Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo harimo inyigisho ku bantu bafite ubwenge

Kandi ibyo yabaremeye ku isi (haba mu matungo, ibihingwa n’amabuye y’agaciro) bifite amabara atandukanye. Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo harimo inyigisho ku bantu bazirikana (ubumwe bw’Imana no kuba ari yo yonyine ikwiye gusengwa)

Ni na we woroheje inyanja kugira ngo (mukuremo) inyama z’umwimerere (amafi) muzirye, munakuremo imitako mwambara. Kandi ubona amato azihinguranya kugira ngo mushakishe ingabire ze,no kugira ngo mubashe gushimira
